name: One Wheel Guy
description:
One Wheel Guy is a fun and very challenging adventure on one wheel. Take control of the One Wheel Guy and his unicycle and bring them to the goal at the end of every level! Can you get past all of the obstacles and keep your balance?

Features

  • More than 20 levels filled with obstacles to test your balancing skills!
  • Change the appearance of your guy with various skins available!
  • Compete against your friends and other players through the online leaderboards!
  • Try to get all the achievements for extra bragging rights!
  • Full controller support (and it's the recommended way to play)!
